scripts._comment: need to compile scrypt package (web3 dependency) on AWS Lambda native environment
scripts.compile: [ -e node_modules/scrypt/build/Release/scrypt.node ] || docker run --rm -v /etc/passwd:/etc/passwd -u `id -u`:`id -g` -v $HOME:$HOME -w $PWD lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 npm install scrypt
